thread.section_title: Dior US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dior US | dior-us.com
thread.title: Eileen (Boston, MA USA)
thread.title_full: Dior US reviewed by Eileen (Boston, MA USA)

author: Eileen (Boston, MA USA)
title: Eileen (Boston, MA USA)
text:
I use Dior products regularly and normally order from a department store. The last I went to order online the Dior website popped up in my Search engine so I decided to take a look.
It was very easy to find what I was looking for on the site and the ordering process was quite simple. The package was delivered to my home on the day that it was expected. The packing yourself was a wonderful surprise and the overall experience was excellent!
I will now use this website for all of my Dior needs.
